# goi.tcga

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of goi.tcga is to return a tidy tibble of TCGA expression values from a summarizedExperiment object generated by the `TCGAbiolinks::GDCprepare()` function.

## Installation

You can install goi.tcga from [Github](https://github.com/koncina/goi.tcga/) with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("koncina/goi.tcga")
```

## Example

```{r example, eval = FALSE}
library(goi.tcga)
get_tcga_goi(my_tcga_summarized_experiment, c("ACTB"))
```
